specific . imperfections caused one defective pixels sub-pixels. ■a pixel consists one red, one green, one blue sub-pixel. ■a defective whole pixel always turned (a bright spot dark background), always (a dark spot bright background). first visible two. ■a defective sub-pixel (dot defect) less visible defective whole pixel small visible specific background. ■5 total bright dark dots. ■no two electrical outlet. : read follow safety instructions cleaning monitor. • clean anti-static screen, lightly dampen soft, clean cloth water. possible, use special screen-cleaning tissue solution suitable anti-static coating. use benzene, thinner, ammonia, abrasive cleaners, compressed air. • use lightly-dampened, soft cloth clean monitor. avoid using detergent kind detergents leave milky film monitor. • notice white powder unpack monitor, wipe cloth. • handle monitor care darker-colored monitor may get scratched show white scuff marks lighter- colored monitor. • help maintain best image anti-static screen, lightly dampen soft, clean cloth water. possible, use special screen-cleaning tissue solution suitable anti-static coating. use benzene, thinner, ammonia, abrasive cleaners, compressed air. • use lightly-dampened, soft cloth clean monitor. avoid using detergent kind detergents leave milky film monitor. • notice white powder unpack monitor, wipe cloth. • handle monitor care darker-colored monitor may get scratched show white scuff marks lighter- colored monitor. • help maintain best image quality monitor, use dynamically changing screen saver turn monitor use. video resolution. appendix | 63maintenance guidelines : cleaning monitor, unplug monitor power cable electrical outlet. : read follow safety instructions cleaning monitor. handling monitor: • clean anti-static screen, lightly dampen soft, clean cloth water. possible, use special screen-cleaning tissue solution suitable anti-static coating. use benzene, thinner, ammonia, abrasive cleaners, compressed air. • use lightly-dampened, soft cloth clean monitor. avoid using detergent kind detergents leave milky film monitor. • notice white powder unpack monitor, wipe cloth. • handle monitor (50-70 cm) eyes. blink frequently moisten rewet eyes working monitor. take regular frequent breaks 20 minutes every two hours. look away monitor gaze distant object 20 feet away least 20 seconds breaks. perform stretches relieve tension neck/arm/back/shoulders breaks. • make sure monitor screen eye level slightly lower sitting front monitor. • adjust tilt monitor, contrast, brightness settings. • adjust ambient lighting around (such overhead lights, desk lamps, curtains blinds nearby windows) minimize reflections glare monitor screen. • use chair provides good lower-back support. • keep forearms horizontal wrists neutral, comfortable position using keyboard mouse. • always leave space rest hands using keyboard mouse. • let upper arms rest naturally sides. • ensure feet resting flat floor. • sitting, make sure weight legs feet front portion seat. adjust chair’s height use footrest necessary maintain proper posture. • vary work activities. try organize work sit work extended (for india only) appendixterminology required. change screen brightness, tint, size many settings using menus displayed screen. variation, grey scale refers medium area black white. changing grey scale gamma adjust ment change medium brightness screen. screen refreshes 60 times per second. screen scanning rate depends performance graphics cards monitor. transmitted displayed monitor screen. horizontal frequency 85 means horizontal lines make image transmitted 85000 times per second. horizontal frequency indicated 85khz. frequency 60 means image transmitted 60 times per second. vertical frequency also called "refresh rate" affects screen flicker. 116appendix appendixresolution level display detail. performing multiple tasks time. prior notice improve performance. © samsung electronicssamsung electronics owns copyright manual.use reproduction manual parts entirety without authorization samsung electronics prohibited.trademarks samsung electronics owned respective owners. .electricity safety •do use damaged power cord plug, loose power socket. •do use multiple products single power socket. •do touch power plug wet hands. •insert power plug way loose. •connect power plug grounded power socket (type 1 insulated devices only). •do bend pull power cord force. careful leave power cord heavy object. •do place power cord product near heat sources. •clean dust around pins power plug power socket dry cloth. •do disconnect power cord product used. •only use power cord provided product samsung. use power cord products. •keep power socket power cord connected unobstructed. ‒the power cord must disconnected cut power product issue occurs. •hold plug disconnecting power cord power socket. •keep plastic packaging reach children. ‒children may suffocate. •do install product unstable vibrating surface (insecure shelf, sloped surface, etc.) ‒the product may fall become damaged and/or cause injury. ‒using product area excess vibration may damage product cause fire. •do install product vehicle place exposed dust, moisture (water drips, etc. •do expose product direct sunlight, heat, hot object stove. ‒the product lifespan may reduced fire may result. •do install product within reach young children. ‒the product may fall injure children. •edible oil (such soybean oil) may damage distort product. keep product away oil pollution. install use product kitchen near kitchen stove.caution •do drop product moving. •do set product front. •when installing product cabinet shelf, make sure bottom edge front product protruding. ‒the product may fall become damaged and/or cause injury. ‒install product cabinets shelves right size. •set product gently. ‒product failure personal injury may result. •installing product unusual place (a place exposed lot fine dust, chemical substances, extreme temperatures significant presence moisture, place product operate continuously extended period time) may seriously affect performance. ‒be sure consult samsung customer service centre want install product place.installation 7 •there high voltage inside product. never disassemble, repair modify product yourself. ‒contact samsung customer service centre repairs. •to move product, first disconnect cables it, including power cable. •if product generates abnormal sounds, burning smell smoke, disconnect power cord immediately contact samsung customer service centre. •do let children hang product climb top it. ‒children may become injured seriously harmed. •if product dropped outer case damaged, turn power disconnect power cord. contact samsung customer service centre. ‒continued use result fire electric shock. •do leave heavy objects items children like (toys, sweets, etc.) top product. ‒the product heavy objects may fall children try reach toys sweets resulting serious injury. •during lightning thunderstorm, power product remove power cable. •do drop objects product apply impact. •do move product pulling power cord cable. •if gas leakage found, touch product power plug. also, ventilate area immediately. •do lift move product pulling power cord cable. •do use keep combustible spray inflammable substance near product. •ensure vents blocked tablecloths curtains. ‒an increased internal temperature may cause fire. •do insert metallic objects (chopsticks, coins, hairpins, etc) objects burn easily (paper, matches, etc) product (via vent input/output ports, etc). ‒be sure power product disconnect power cord water foreign substances entered product. contact samsung customer service centre. •do place objects containing liquid (vases, pots, bottles, etc) metallic objects top product. ‒be sure power product disconnect power cord water foreign substances entered product. contact samsung customer service centre.operation 8 resolution frequency. ‒your eyesight may deteriorate. •do put / adapters together. •remove plastic bag / adapter use it. •do let water enter / adapter device get device wet. ‒an electric shock fire damaged power cord plug, loose power socket. •do use multiple products single power socket. •do touch power plug wet hands. •insert power plug way loose. •connect power plug grounded power socket (type 1 insulated devices only). •do bend pull power cord force. careful leave power cord heavy object. •do place power cord product near heat sources. •clean dust around pins power plug power socket dry cloth. •do disconnect power cord product used. •only use power cord provided product samsung. use power cord products. •keep power socket power cord connected unobstructed. ‒the power cord must disconnected cut power product issue occurs. •hold plug disconnecting power cord power socket. •do install product poorly ventilated spaces bookcase closet. •install product least 10 cm away wall allow ventilation. •keep plastic packaging reach children. ‒children may suffocate. •do install product unstable vibrating surface (insecure shelf, sloped surface, etc.) ‒the product may fall become damaged and/or cause injury. ‒using product area excess vibration may damage product cause fire. •do install product vehicle place exposed dust, moisture (water drips, etc. •do expose product direct product using 3d function understand following safety inform ation using 3d function. warning some viewers may experience discomfort viewing 3d product dizziness, nausea headaches. experience symptom, stop viewing 3d product, remove 3d active glasses rest. watching 3d images extended period time may cause eye strain. feel eye strain, stop viewing 3d product, remove 3d active glasses rest. a responsible adult frequently check children using 3d function. reports tired eyes, headaches, dizziness, nausea, child stop viewing 3d product rest. do use 3d active glasses purposes (such general eyeglasses, sunglasses, protective goggles, etc.) do use 3d function 3d active glasse walking moving around. using 3d function 3d active glasses moving around may result injuries due running objects, tripping, and/or falling. 3d mode : select 3d input format.  want feel 3d effect fully, please wear 3d active glasses first, select 3d mode list pr ovides best 3d viewing experience.  watching 3d images, turn 3d active glasses. 105screen adjustment4 4 screen adjustment  file format may supported “2d 3d.”  “side side” “top & bottom” available resolution 720p, 1080i 1080p mode set connected / lcds may degrade optimum resolution selected. resolution: 1920 x 1080 vertical frequency (refresh rate): 60hz due nature manufacturing product, approximat ely 1 pixel per million (1ppm) may brighter darker panel. affect product performance. the number sub-pixels panel type: 40, 46, 55 : 6,220,800 run " auto adjustment " improve picture quality. noise still found even auto adjustment, adjust coarse fine. leaving screen fixed stationary image extended period time may cause afterimage burn-in defective pixels. activate power-saving mode dynamic screen saver w ill using product extended period time. unlike monitors, - monitors (due nature panel) set one resolution obtain optimum picture quality. therefore, setting resolution specified resolution may degrade picture quality. avoid this, recommended select optimum resolution specified monitor. 207appendix appendixprevention afterimage burn-in continuously changing video pattern. panel displays fixed pattern extended period time (more 12 hours), slight voltage difference may occur electrodes pixels control liquid crystals. accumulated voltage difference reduced. appendixpowering off, screen saver power saving mode power product 4 hours using 20 hours. (de40a / de46a / de55a) power product 2 hours using 12 hours. (me40a / me46a / me55a / ue46a / ue55a / de40a / de46a / de55a) go display properties > power supply set product power required. using screen saver recommended. regular color change avoid combinations text color background color contrasting brightness. regular text color change use bright colors similar brightness. move change text every 30 minutes shown below. regularly display moving image along logo.interval: display moving image along logo 60 seconds using 4 hours. : : : : : [ step 1 ] [ step 2 ] [ step 3 ] 20:30 209appendix appendixthe best way protect product afterimage burn-in switching power setting system run screen saver use. also, warranty service may limited depending instruction guide. 210appendix appendixcorrect disposal product (waste electrical & electronic collection systems) electronic accessories (e.g. charger, headset, cable) disposed household waste end working life. prevent possible harm environment human health uncontrolled waste disposal, please separate items types waste recycle responsibly promote sustainable reuse material resources. local government office, details take items environmentally safe recycling. purchase contract. product electronic accessories mixed commercial wastes disposal. (applicable european union european countries separate battery return systems.) product disposed household waste end working life. marked, chemical symbols hg, cd pb indicate battery contains mercury, cadmium lead reference levels directive 2006/66. health environment. types waste recycle local, free battery return system. 211appendix appendixterminology required. allows change screen brightness, tint, size many settings using menus displayed screen. variation, grey scale refers medium area black white. changing grey scale gamma adjust ment change medium brightness screen. screen refreshes 60 times per second. screen scanning rate depends performance graphics cards product. transmitted displayed product screen. horizontal frequency 85 means horizontal lines make image transmitted 85 000 times per second, horizontal frequency indicated 85khz. frequency 60 means image transmitted 60 times per second. vertical frequency also called "refresh rate" affects screen flicker. 212appendix model.auto protection time formation burnt ghost images screen. • / 2 hours / 4 hours / 8 hours / 10 hours technology. • pixel shift (off / ) ―horizontal, vertical time enabled pixel shift set . • horizontal: sets many pixels screen moves horizontally. • vertical: sets many pixels screen moves vertically. • time: set time interval performing horizontal vertical movement, respectively. ―the pixel shift value may differ depending product size (inches) mode. ―displaying still image 4:3 output extended period time may cause image retention. defect product. ―if picture size set screen fit, pixel shift disabled. screen burn protection -the displayed image may differ depending model.timer ―mode, period, time, start time end time enabled timer set repeat interval . • mode: select screen protective pattern display. - pixel: pixels screen alternate black continuously. - rolling bar: vertical bar moves left right. - fading screen: entire screen becomes brighter, darker. ―the rolling bar fading screen patterns appear regardless specified repeat period time. • period: specify time interval activate screen burn protection function. ―the option enabled repeat selected timer. • time: [ step 3 ] [ step 2 ] [ step 1 ]20:30 -regularly display moving image along logo. ⃕manufactured licence u.s. patent no’s: 5,956,674, 5,974,380, 5,978,762, 6,487,535, 6,226,616, 7,212,872, 7,003,467, 7,272,567, 7,668,723, 7,392,195, 7,930,184, 7,333,929 7,548,853. , symbol, symbol together registered trademarks & premium sound | 5.1 trademark , inc. ⓒ2012 , inc. rights reserved. purchased divx video-on-demand () movies. obtain registration code, locate divx section device setup menu. go vod.divx.com information complete registration. terminology 480i / 480p / 720p / 1080i / 1080p____ scanning rates refers number effective scanning lines decides screen resolution. scanning rate may indicated (interlaced) p (progressive), depending scanning method. - scanningscanning refers process sending pixels form image progressively. larger number pixels deliver clearer vivid picture. - progressivein progressive scan mode, lines pixels scanned one one (progressively) screen. - interlacedin interlaced scan mode, every line pixels scanned top bottom first remaining lines pixels (that scanned) scanned.non-interlace mode interlace mode____ non-interlace mode (progressive scan) displays horizontal line top bottom screen progressively. interlace mode displays odd number lines first even number lines next. non-interlace mode mainly used monitors produces screen clarity interlace mode mainly used tvs. shorter distance dots produces higher resolution. dot pitch refers distance shortest distance dots colour. dot pitch measured millimeters.vertical frequency____ product displays single image many times per second (like fluorescent light flickers) display image viewer see. rate single image displayed repeatedly per second called vertical frequency refresh rate. vertical frequency measured hz. displayed 60 times one second. required scan single line left right side screen called horizontal cycle. reciprocal number horizontal cycle called horizontal frequency. horizontal frequency measured khz. video source device connected product camcorder video player.component ports (green, blue red)____ component ports, identify, transmit receive contrast signals, provide superior picture quality video connection methods. function allows automatic exchange information monitor produce optimum display environment. product uses (international standard) execute plug & play. number horizontal dots (pixels) vertical dots (pixels) form screen. represents level display detail. higher resolution enables data displayed screen useful perform multiple tasks simultaneously. 1,920 horizontal pixels (horizontal resolution) 1,080 vertical pixels (vertical resolution). (digital versatile disc)____ refers -sized mass storage disk save multimedia (audio, video game) applications using -2 video compression technology. prior notice improve performance. © samsung exterior product. 5 connect power cord product cleaning finished. 6 power product computer.electricity safety •do use damaged power cord plug, loose power socket. •do use multiple products single power socket. •do touch power plug wet hands. •insert power plug way loose. •connect power plug grounded power socket (type 1 insulated devices only). •do bend pull power cord force. careful leave power cord heavy object. •do place power cord product near heat sources. •clean dust around pins power plug power socket dry cloth. •do disconnect power cord product used. •only use power cord provided product samsung. use power cord products. •keep power socket power cord connected unobstructed. ‒the power cord must disconnected cut power product issue occurs. •hold plug disconnecting power cord power socket. 6warning • , . •do install product poorly ventilated spaces bookcase closet. •install product least 10 cm away wall allow ventilation. •keep plastic packaging reach children. ‒children may suffocate. •do install product unstable vibrating surface (insecure shelf, sloped surface, etc.) ‒the product may fall become damaged and/or cause injury. ‒using product area excess vibration may damage product cause fire. •do install product vehicle place exposed dust, moisture (water drips, etc. •do expose product direct sunlight, heat, hot object stove. ‒the product lifespan may reduced fire may result. •do install product within reach young children. ‒the product may fall injure children. •edible oil (such soybean oil) may damage distort product. keep product away oil pollution. install use product kitchen near kitchen stove.caution •do drop product moving. •do set product front. •when installing product cabinet shelf, make sure bottom edge front product protruding. ‒the product may fall become damaged and/or cause injury. ‒install product cabinets shelves right size. •set product gently. ‒product failure personal injury may result. •installing product unusual place (a place exposed lot fine dust, chemical substances, extreme temperatures significant presence moisture, place product operate continuously extended period time) may seriously affect performance. ‒be sure consult samsung customer service center want install product place.installation 7warning •there high voltage inside product. never disassemble, repair modify product yourself. ‒contact samsung customer service center repairs. •to move product, first disconnect cables it, including power cable. •if product generates abnormal sounds, burning smell smoke, disconnect power cord immediately contact samsung customer service center. •do let children hang product climb top it. ‒children may become injured seriously harmed. •if product dropped outer case damaged, turn power disconnect power cord. contact samsung customer service center. ‒continued use result fire electric shock. •do leave heavy objects items children like (toys, sweets, etc.) top product. ‒the product heavy objects may fall children try reach toys sweets resulting serious injury. •during lightning thunderstorm, power product remove power cable. •do drop objects product apply impact. •do move product pulling power cord cable. •if gas leakage found, touch product power plug. also, ventilate area immediately. •do lift move product pulling power cord cable. •do use keep combustible spray inflammable substance near product. •ensure vents blocked tablecloths curtains. ‒an increased internal temperature may cause fire. •do insert metallic objects (chopsticks, coins, hairpins, etc) (khz)vertical frequency(hz)pixel clock(mhz)sync polarity(h/v) left right side screen called horizontal cycle. reciprocal number horizontal cycle called horizontal frequency. horizontal frequency measured khz. -vertical frequencythe product displays single image multiple times per second (like fluorescent light) display viewer sees. rate single image displayed repeatedly per second called vertical frequency refresh rate. vertical frequency measured hz. resolution horizontal frequency (khz)vertical frequency(hz)pixel clock(mhz)sync polarity(h/v) (cost customers) ―when service requested, spite warranty, may charge visit service technician following cases. • service technician gives instructions use product simply adjusts options without disassembling product. • defect caused external environmental factors (internet, antenna, wired signal, etc.) • product reinstalled devices connected additionally installing purchased product first time. • product reinstalled move different spot move different house. • customer requests instructions use another company's product. • customer requests instructions use network another company's programme. • customer requests software installation setup product. • service technician removes/cleans dusts foreign materials inside product. • customer requests installation additionally purchasing product home-shopping online.a product damage caused customer's fault • external impact drop. • use supplies separatly sold product unspecified samsung. • repair person besides engineer outsourcing service company partner samsung • remodeling repairing product customer. • using incorrect voltage non-authorised electrical connections. • following "cautions" user manual. • product fails natural disaster. (applicable countries separate collection systems) local, free battery return system. optimum picture quality afterimage • due nature manufacturing product, approximately 1 pixel per million (1ppm) may brighter darker panel. affect product performance. -the number sub-pixels panel type: 6,220,800 • run auto adjustment improve picture quality. noise still found even auto adjustment, adjust coarse fine. • leaving screen fixed stationary image extended period time may cause afterimage burn-in defective pixels. -activate power-saving mode dynamic screen saver using product extended period time. ―afterimage burn-in occur panel operating proper conditions.black matrix ―the best way protect product afterimage burn-in switching power setting instruction guide. • powering off, screen saver power saving mode -power product 2 hours using 12 hours. -go display properties > power supply set product power required. -using screen saver recommended. • regular colour change -use 2 coloursswitch 2 colours every 30 minutes shown above. • avoid combinations text colour background colour contrasting brightness. (brightness: refers lightness darkness colour varies depending amount light emitted.) ―avoid using grey may contribute afterimage burn-in. ―avoid using colours contrasting brightness (black white; grey). : -use bright colours similar brightness. : : : -move change text every 30 minutes shown below. [ step 3 ] [ step 2 ] [ step 1 ]20:30 -regularly display moving image along logo. ⃕manufactured licence u.s. patent no’s: 5,956,674, 5,974,380, 5,978,762, 6,487,535, 6,226,616, 7,212,872, 7,003,467, 7,272,567, 7,668,723, 7,392,195, 7,930,184, 7,333,929 7,548,853. , symbol, symbol together registered trademarks & premium sound | 5.1 trademark , inc. ⓒ2012 , inc. rights reserved. purchased divx video-on-demand () movies. obtain registration code, locate divx section device setup menu. go vod.divx.com information complete registration. terminology 480i / 480p / 720p / 1080i / 1080p____ scanning rates refers number effective scanning lines decides screen resolution. scanning rate may indicated (interlaced) p (progressive), depending scanning method. - scanningscanning refers process sending pixels form image progressively. larger number pixels deliver clearer vivid picture. - progressivein progressive scan mode, lines pixels scanned one one (progressively) screen. - interlacedin interlaced scan mode, every line pixels scanned top bottom first remaining lines pixels (that scanned) scanned.non-interlace mode interlace mode____ non-interlace mode (progressive scan) displays horizontal line top bottom screen progressively. interlace mode displays odd number lines first even number lines next. non-interlace mode mainly used monitors produces screen clarity interlace mode mainly used tvs. red, green blue dots. shorter distance dots produces higher resolution. dot pitch refers distance shortest distance dots colour. dot pitch measured millimeters.vertical frequency____ product displays single image many times per second (like fluorescent light flickers) display image viewer see. rate single image displayed repeatedly per second called vertical frequency refresh rate. vertical frequency measured hz. displayed 60 times one second. required scan single line left right side screen called horizontal cycle. reciprocal number horizontal cycle called horizontal frequency. horizontal frequency measured khz. video source device connected product camcorder video player.component ports (green, blue red)____ component ports, identify, transmit receive contrast signals, provide superior picture quality video connection methods. function allows automatic exchange information monitor produce optimum display environment. product uses (international standard) execute plug & play. number horizontal dots (pixels) vertical dots (pixels) form screen. represents level display detail. higher resolution enables data displayed screen useful perform multiple tasks simultaneously. 1,920 horizontal pixels (horizontal resolution) 1,080 vertical pixels (vertical resolution). (digital versatile disc)____ refers -sized mass storage disk save multimedia (audio, video game) applications using -2 video compression technology. prior notice improve performance. © samsung computer.electricity safety •do use damaged power cord plug, loose power socket. •do use multiple products single power socket. •do touch power plug wet hands. •insert power plug way loose. •connect power plug grounded power socket (type 1 insulated devices only). •do bend pull power cord force. careful leave power cord heavy object. •do place power cord product near heat sources. •clean dust around pins power plug power socket dry cloth. •do disconnect power cord product used. •only use power cord provided product samsung. use power cord products. •keep power socket power cord connected unobstructed. ‒the power cord must disconnected cut power product issue occurs. •hold plug disconnecting power cord power socket. •do install product poorly ventilated spaces bookcase closet. •install product least 10 cm away wall allow ventilation. •keep plastic packaging reach children. ‒children may suffocate. •do install product unstable vibrating surface (insecure shelf, sloped surface, etc.) ‒the product may fall become damaged and/or cause injury. ‒using product area excess vibration may damage product cause fire. •do install product vehicle place exposed dust, moisture (water drips, etc. •do expose product direct sunlight, heat, hot object stove. ‒the product lifespan may reduced fire may result. •do install product within reach young children. ‒the product may fall injure children. •edible oil (such soybean oil) may damage distort product. keep product away oil pollution. install use product kitchen near kitchen stove.caution •do drop product moving. •do set product front. •when installing product cabinet shelf, make sure bottom edge front product protruding. ‒the product may fall become damaged and/or cause injury. ‒install product cabinets shelves right size. •set product gently. ‒product failure personal injury may result. •installing product unusual place (a place exposed lot fine dust, chemical substances, extreme temperatures significant presence moisture, place product operate continuously extended period time) may seriously affect performance. ‒be sure consult samsung customer service center want install product place.installation 7 •there high voltage inside product. never disassemble, repair modify product yourself. ‒contact samsung customer service center repairs. •to move product, first disconnect cables it, including power cable. •if product generates abnormal sounds, burning smell smoke, disconnect power cord immediately contact samsung customer service center. •do let children hang product climb top it. ‒children may become injured seriously harmed. •if product dropped outer case damaged, turn power disconnect power cord. contact samsung customer service center. ‒continued use result fire electric shock. •do leave heavy objects items children like (toys, sweets, etc.) top product. ‒the product heavy objects may fall children try reach toys sweets resulting serious injury. •during lightning thunderstorm, power product remove power cable. •do drop objects product apply impact. •do move product pulling power cord cable. •if gas leakage found, touch product power plug. also, ventilate area immediately. •do lift move product pulling power cord cable. •do use keep combustible spray inflammable substance near product. •ensure vents blocked tablecloths curtains. ‒an increased internal temperature may cause fire. •do insert metallic objects (chopsticks, coins, hairpins, etc) objects burn easily (paper, matches, etc) product (via vent input/output ports, etc). ‒be sure power product disconnect power cord water foreign substances entered product. contact samsung customer service center. •do place objects containing liquid (vases, pots, bottles, etc) metallic objects top product. ‒be sure power product disconnect power cord water foreign substances entered product. contact samsung customer service center.operation 8 •leaving screen fixed stationary image extended period time may cause afterimage burn-in defective pixels. ‒activate power-saving mode moving-picture screen saver using product extended period time. •disconnect power cord power socket plan using product extended period time (vacation, etc). ‒dust accumulation combined heat cause fire, electric shock electric leakage. •use product recommended resolution frequency. ‒your eyesight may deteriorate. •do put / adapters together. •remove plastic bag / adapter use it. •do let water enter / adapter device get device wet. ‒an electric shock fire may result. ‒avoid using product outdoors exposed rain snow. ‒be careful get / adapter wet wash floor. •do put / adapter near heating apparatus. ‒otherwise, fire may result. •keep / adapter well-ventilated area. •if place / power adapter hanging cord input facing upwards, display → settings → advanced → monitor, adjust refresh rate monitor settings. •windows /2000: go control panel → display → settings → advanced → monitor, adjust refresh rate monitor settings. appearance personalization → display → screen resolution → advanced settings → monitor, adjust refresh rate monitor settings. •windows 8(windows 8.1): go settings → control panel → appearance personalization → display → screen resolution → advanced settings → monitor, adjust refresh rate monitor settings. •windows 10: go settings → system → display → advanced display settings → display adapter properties → monitor, adjust screen refresh rate monitor settings. •windows : go control panel → appearance themes → display → settings, adjust resolution. •windows /2000: go control panel → display → settings, adjust resolution. •windows vista: go control panel → appearance personalization → personalize → display settings , adjust resolution. •windows 7: go control panel → appearance personalization → display → adjust resolution, adjust resolution. •windows 8(windows 8.1): go settings → control panel → appearance personalization → display → adjust resolution, adjust resolution. •windows 10: go settings → system → display → advanced display settings , adjust resolution. •windows : set power-saving mode control panel → appearance themes → display → screen saver settings → power options . •windows /2000: set power-saving mode control panel → display → screen saver settings → power options . •windows vista: set power-saving mode control panel → appearance personalization → personalize → screen saver settings → power options . •windows 7: set power-saving mode control panel → appearance personalization → personalize → screen saver settings → power options . •windows settings. • contrast: changes level bright parts picture keeping dark parts unchanged. • brightness: changes level light picture. • colour: changes level saturation. sharpness fine details. • noise reduction: filters reduces noise picture. • colour temperature: sets colour temperature cool (bluer), normal (balanced), warm (redder). picture: digitally adjusts picture quality optimal contrast, transitions digital pictures. ou switch feature off. –colour enhancement: makes colours vivid improves resolution details bright colours. ou switch feature off. • mode: adjusts picture • picture format: changes picture format. • horizontal shift: adjusts picture horizontally - ypbpr. • vertical shift: adjusts picture vertically - ypbpr. 24features • /a2cornerdwnrt clock menu appears. standby monitor power cable electrical outlet. : read follow safety instructions cleaning monitor. • clean anti-static screen, lightly dampen soft, clean cloth water. possible, use special screen-cleaning tissue solution suitable anti-static coating. use benzene, thinner, ammonia, abrasive cleaners, compressed air. • use lightly-dampened, soft cloth clean monitor. avoid using detergent kind detergents leave milky film monitor. • notice white powder unpack monitor, wipe cloth. • handle monitor care darker-colored monitor may get scratched show white scuff marks lighter- colored monitor. • help maintain best image quality monitor, use dynamically changing screen saver turn monitor use.
